name: Got Your Back
text: You protect an ally from attacks he doesn’t see coming.
benefit: If you successfully use the aid another action to give an ally who also has this feat a +2 bonus to AC against an opponent’s next attack, the ally is also not considered flanked or flat-footed against that opponent until the beginning of your next turn.
normal: You can use aid another to grant an ally a +2 bonus to AC against the next attack from an adjacent foe.
staminaText: If you spend 3 stamina points when you use this feat, your ally benefits from the AC bonus until the beginning of your next turn. (Melee Tactics Toolbox 10)
text_zh: 你保护了一个未曾发现危险的同伴。
benefit_zh: 当你成功通过援助他人动作给一个拥有该专长的盟友+2AC以对抗下一次攻击时，该盟友在直到你的下一回合开始前，将不会被夹击和陷入措手不及。
normal_zh: 你援助他人动作只会给盟友+2AC以对抗一个邻接敌人的攻击。
staminaText_zh: 如果你在使用该专长时消耗3点耐力，你的盟友获得的AC加值将会持续到你的下一回合开始。
